#summary The rel="icon" attribute indicates that the referenced document is an icon for the current document.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute

`rel="icon"` is one of several [LinkTypes link types] for describing relationships between documents.

== Usage ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `rel="icon"` attribute on these elements:

  * [LinkElement <link>]

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
